author: quinnanm
body:
#### PR description:

Addition to "do not print SiStrip O2O passwords in clear" #33900 https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/33900

prevents SiStripConfigDb.cc (https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/CMSSW_12_0_DEVEL_X/OnlineDB/SiStripConfigDb/src/SiStripConfigDb.cc#L124) from printing password

concerns line 314 in SiStripDbParams.cc:

changed: 
ss << " Database account (ConfDb)  : " << confdb_ << std::endl;
to: 
ss << " Database account (ConfDb)  : " << user_ + "/******@" + path_ << std::endl;

#### PR validation:

It compiles

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Not a backport, a backport to all production cycles will be needed.
title: do not print SiStrip O2O passwords in dbParams_
